name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Offering a comprehensive skill set in engineering principles, I am a results-oriented Senior Engineer with 8 years of extensive experience in civil and mechanical engineering domains. My expertise includes proficiency in **AutoCAD** for 3D modeling, as well as strong capabilities in finite element analysis (FEA) to support detailed load calculations and design assessments. I excel in creating precise load charts and lifting plans essential for safe and efficient operations. Additionally, I am adept in the use of **MS Office** for project documentation and reporting.

I leverage advanced analytical approaches combined with hands-on experience in rigging and crane operations to ensure that projects meet safety and compliance standards. My commitment to delivering high-quality engineering solutions is underscored by a proven track record of managing complex engineering projects on time and within budget.
